    Subclasses of Phase in com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.phases
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    End
    Represents the ending phase of the game, where the game has concluded and no further actions are permitted.
    class 
    Execute
    Represents the phase in the game where all issued orders are executed.
    class 
    GamePlay
    This class and its subclasses represent specific states within the gameplay part of a game managed by a GameEngine.
    class 
    IssueOrder
    The phase in the game where players are prompted to issue their orders, such as moving armies or executing special actions.
    class 
    MainPlay
    Serves as an abstract base for phases within the main gameplay, overseeing commands specific to active gameplay states.
    class 
    MapEditor
    This abstract class represents the phase where map editing operations can be performed.
    class 
    PlaySetup
    This class represents the phase where the setup for playing the game occurs.
    class 
    PostLoad
    Represents the phase after loading the map.
    class 
    Preload
    This class represents the Preload phase of map editing in the game's core logic.
    class 
    Reinforcement
    This class represents the reinforcement phase of the game.
